mapper.select: SELECT re.* FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( (SELECT boreportno, reportdetail, report_date AS reportDate, complete, r.userNo, m.userid, r.boardno, b.boardtitle FROM reportboard r, board b, member m WHERE r.boardno = b.boardno AND b.userno = m.userno ORDER BY boreportno DESC) B)) re WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT boreportno, reportdetail, report_date AS reportDate, complete, r.userNo, m.userid, r.boardno, b.boardtitle FROM reportboard r, board b, member m WHERE r.boardno = b.boardno AND b.userno = m.userno AND boreportno = #{boreportno}
SELECT userno FROM Board WHERE boardno = #{boardno}
SELECT boardno, boardtitle, content, write_date AS writedate, userno, boardtypeno FROM BOARD WHERE boardno = #{boardno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP (objectno, name, price, remain, shopcontent) VALUES (#{objectno},#{name},#{price},#{remain},#{shopcontent})
INSERT INTO SHOPFILE (fileno, originname, storedname, filesize, objectno) VALUES (seq_shopfile.nextval, #{originname},#{storedname},#{filesize},#{objectno})
mapper.select: SELECT boardno FROM reportboard WHERE boreportno = #{deleteNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARDTYPENO = 5 WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardno}
UPDATE reportboard SET COMPLETE = 'Y' WHERE boreportno = #{deleteNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blacklist(blackno, blackdate, reason, userno) VALUES(seq_blacklist.nextval,sysdate,#{reason},#{userno})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT userno, username, userid, userpw, email,address, zipcode, phone, positionno FROM member where lower(username) LIKE lower('%${keyword}%') ORDER BY userno DESC ) A ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{paging.startNo} AND #{paging.endNo}
